WorkItem.ClosedComment: This bug has been fixed. If you're still seeing this issue, please re-open the bug (click "Re-open Issue" below the "ISSUES" tab). Thanks!
WorkItem.Description:
* have a snippet like this

```
enum E {
 A, B, C
}
```

* in the language service call getScriptLexicalStructure for that file
-> you will get two items with the same bounds: (1) item E of type enum and (2) item E of type var
WorkItem.Summary: getScriptLexicalStructure returns enums as enum and as var

Comments.Message: Thanks for reporting.  We'll get this looked into.
